title: Lab sustainability programs LEAF and My Green Lab®: impact, user experience & suitability
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00387J, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Bianca R. Schell, Nico Bruns
Sustainable lab programs such as LEAF or My Green Lab® help make research labs more sustainable. The article provides a decision-making aid by comparing the programs, their impact and by a quantitative analysis of the user experience of the programs.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
